author: Staff Reporter
text:
Demanding that the proposed taluk office for the newly formed Komarapalayam taluk be established in Pallipalayam, over 150 members of various political parties and the public staged a protest on Raja Street in Pallipalayam on Monday.

After the government announced the formation of Komarapalayam taluk, the Collector submitted a proposal to establish the office in Avathipalayam, near Pallipalayam. However, when protest erupted in Komarapalayam demanding that the taluk office should be established there, Minister for Industries and Transport P. Thangamani promised to construct the office in Komarapalayam. This did not go well with the people in Pallipalayam. They formed a 20-member joint action committee which decided to stage protest on Monday.

They raised slogans against the Minister and demanded that the office be constructed in Pallipalayam. They said that a strike would be observed in Pallipalayam on February 17.
title: Taluk office sought in Pallipalayam
